3.post_text:
**Contest Alert**

Catch Singapore's hottest dance crews as they battle it out for the chance to represent Singapore in Japan!

Red Bull 25% Less Sugar is excited to be the Official Energy Drink and we have a pair of tickets to this Sunday's finals up for grabs! 

Simply Like and Share this post on your wall (remember, you will need to set the Post privacy to Public so we can see this), Comment below with why you would like to win this and Tag the person that you will want to attend with.

Contest ends Thursday, 20th April 2017, 5pm.
Winner will be announced on Friday, 21st April and notified via Facebook Messenger.

Let's go people!

4.post_text:
From “power-posturing”, drinking lots of water to saying affirmative words to themselves, most people have different “rituals” or actions they do to psych themselves up for a big meeting or presentation. 

While none of our ingredients guarantee confidence (we wish), drinking a can of Red Bull 25% less sugar will decrease stress levels and increase your concentration!

We’re interested to know what are some of the ways you use to calm your nerves or pump yourselves up before an important event. Share them with us by commenting below! :D

5.post_text:
It’s easy for professionals holding office jobs to get into a cycle of facing their screens all day at work and craving the comfort of home after an exhausting day. 

Break that cycle and slot in an hour of exercise everyday! It’s proven that regular exercise helps to release stress as well as increase your focus. 

For a healthier body, sharper mind and improved performance at work, remember to allocate an hour to work out everyday. Have a can of Red Bull 25% less sugar to make your workout more effective!
5.story: Red Bull Singapore is feeling motivated.

7.post_text: Congratulations Veronica Lau for winning the Red Bull Valentine's Experience! Here's wishing you and your partner much joy and love in your relationship. Hope you enjoy the getaway we've specially created!

8.post_text:
Whether it’s gearing up for a crucial competition or right before an intensive training session, you definitely need a boost in energy and concentration. 

Drink a can of Red Bull 25% less sugar about 30 minutes before the start of an activity where you will face increased physical and mental exertion for the effects to kick in!

9.post_text:
Singapore! Did you also have a rough concert night yesterday? We did. 

Thankfully, we had a bunch of Red Bull 25% Less Sugar with us in the shuttle for that 2 hour ride in traffic to keep us pumped and ready for the show. 

If you want to win a carton of Red Bull 25% Less Sugar for your next concert adventure,  share your story from last night and we'll be happy to give you a helping hand.

#redbullmoments

10.post_text:
Challenge yourselves by repeating ‘Glucuronolactone’ five times as quickly as you can!

What’s that? 

Glucuronolactone helps to eliminate waste substances from the body. It can also be found in red wine, grain and our Red Bull drink. Apart from boosting energy levels, a can of Red Bull also has detoxifying properties! 

Have a can of Red Bull 25% less sugar!

comments.message: Very strong

11.post_text:
Happy Valentine’s Day to all you lovebirds out there! 

We know that it takes a lot of effort and commitment to maintain a relationship so we’ve created a Red Bull recipe for a lasting relationship!

2 dash(es) Honesty
2 tsp Communication
1 sprig(s) Patience
1 cup Romance
2 wedge(s) Respect
1 tbsp Laughter

Mix all of those together along with a can of Red Bull 25% less sugar for energy and you have the Red Bull Relationship cocktail! Remember to take part in our Valentine's Experience contest!

*the above is not backed scientifically and it definitely takes much more than that to make a relationship work

14.post_text:
**Valentine’s Giveaway**
We may not be cupid but we have specially curated a memorable and exciting Red Bull Valentine’s Experience for you active lovebirds out there! So what’s up for grabs? 

Stand to win an exclusive 2D1N getaway at Hard Rock Hotel Sentosa with private access to an adrenaline-filled waterpark and sumptuous dining experience at one of the island’s newest F&B additions! We will also make a commemorative video of your date!

Simply Like, Share and Comment below on our Facebook post with your idea of a fun date! Include a photo of yourself (and your significant other of course!) along with a can of Red Bull 25% less sugar to participate in the contest! (Remember to #redbullromance and #redbullmoments, it’s easier for us to find your post this way)

Don’t leave out the details and we’re looking forward to some fun stories!

(Contest ends 19th February)

comments.message: Our fun filled activity is weekly cycling. We shared the same adventure and long conversations on quiet rural roads along punggol waterway. Our weekly cohension activity need to be fuelled with energy from redbull. #redbullromance #redbullmoments

A foundation of a happy relationship is friendship and having each other as recreational partners definitely helps in building my relationship! :) Playing tennis and getting fit together on weekends after a long and tiring week is definitely our favourite active date! And what's better than having the Redbull 25% less sugar to perk us up to continue our lovely date after our match? #Redbullromance #Redbullmoments

Couple who chase the Pokémon together stay together. Playing Pokémon go together enable us to explore our neighborhood better and   We have been more adventurous in our exploring trying to reach out to weird places to hunt for unique Pokémon. Red Bull 25% less sugar help to give us a boost to "catch em all" :) 
#redbullromenca 
#redbullmoments

My husband Sam Yap and I are never running out of fun dating ideas. We always find "Singapore is amazing place" for active lovebirds like us. 
Just like this valentine weekend, we decided to visit Universal Studios Singapore. The roller coasters, Transformers ride, and thrilling river raft ride really rocked our day! Luckily we had Red Bull 25% less sugar to increase our physical endurance and vitalize back our body.

And we would like to experience more fun dates with Red Bull Singapore and I think the most fun date idea is to get a short getaway with my husband!
Visiting a waterpark will be a great idea. Thrilling water slides and Rainbow Reef snorkeling are perfect for people who love adrenaline rush activities like us. The exciting day continued by a delightful dinner and a sweet staycation. 
OMG! What is more fun than that date?????? This is all we need to flourish our budding romances! #redbullromance #redbullmoments

Our Fun date at Sentosa . The beach , the sunny yet cooling weather which is great To use up the high adrenaline for the whole day fun, with Red Bull 25% Less Sugar to quench our thirst and give us the kick to allow us to create our lovely full day of #redbullromance and capturing the lovely #redbullmoments together.

Our favourite #redbullmoments begin with hiking or jogging around the park. At the end of all the strenuous activities, we will end it with a relaxing picnic to spark the #redbullromance with our healthy red bull 25% less sugar drink and sandwiches! Can't do without our favourite drink and always need to bring at least 2 cans along so that we don't fight over it! 
This is our ideal #fundate for now as our common goal is to lose at least 5kg by June and we are challenging each other to do the impossible! Who will shed the kilos off first? I'm excited to know😁
Liked and shared 👍
Thanks for this generous giveaway!

Both of us are active nature couples that seek adventure to climb the Bukit Timah , run a full marathon and many more .every journey we embark, there is always few cans of   redbull drink to keep our energy fuel and energy . Waking up 6 am Everyday is easy with the redbull 25'percent less sugar to fuel our day. No matter what activity , Red Bull is always with us at even the most exciting and challenging moments . Cannot leave home without the redbull drink in the morning.  
#REDBULLMOMENTS #REDBULLROMANCE

My kind of fun,
Is simply basking in the sun,
Together with hubby, daughter and son 
Or having a family run,
And when we are done,
Replenishing with Red Bull and a bun,
These are simple healthy joys in life which doesn't cost a ton!
#redbullromance #redbullmoments

Every date with my loved one is a memorable and fun day. Especially on every weekend when that is our only free time of the week after a long and tiring week of working and studying. We will explore parts of Singapore we've never been before like bukit timah nature reserve, macRitchie reservoir, southern ridges walk, etc. It such a fun time exploring all this places trying to figure out the way by ourselves and draining all our energy just by walking and exploring around. After a long day of exploring, we will then go for food hunting. A nice meal will be appreciated after a long and tiring day. Finally, we end the day by sitting down at some random places for a chat and chilling like esplanade roof garden, clark quak, etc. Having a fun date with your loved does not require a luxury plan or spending but rather on the quality time spent together. 
It’s not the quantity of time that you spend with someone that matters, rather it’s the quality of the time.

#redbullromance  #redbullmoments

Every week is a fun filled date for us!  It's a weekend dip that hubby and I enjoyed so much! We like doing laps and freestyles for fun! Sometimes we do games like who's the fastest swimmer! Here's a pic of our fun filled saturdate dip last weekend! Of course with Red Bull 25% Sugar!!! ❤️ #redbullromance #redbullmoments

Our best fun filled activity is anything that spells vacation! We love anything to do with the sun, sea, sand & Redbull 25% less sugar can always be found in our backpacks! #redbullromance #redbullmoments
Toh Layhoon Ang Lam Soon Faith Fong

comments.message:
So this year was the first as a married couple 💑 and it was interesting 😆...

Aunty: "Did you put on weight?"
Me: "Ya, I'm in my bulking phase now. After I hit my target then I'll start cutting, it's more efficient to build muscle mass like that"
Aunty: *blur look* "Oh...I didn't know, ok eat more then"

Aunty: "Do you exercise regularly or not?"
Me: "Ya...i'm exercising my jaw right now" *Continues eating* ;) 

Uncle: "When are you planning to have kids?"
Me: "I'm waiting for the next budget speech, heard maybe the baby bonus might increase again"
Uncle: "Don't need to wait la...can't be much"
Me: "Ok...give me a $2000 angpow and I'll bring the date forward"
Uncle: (changes topic) "haha, any new travel plans?"

Uncle 2: "So how many kids do you plan to have?"
Me: "I was planning on 2...but whenever I see your kids, I tell myself to stick to 1" 
Uncle 2: *awkward laugh* "Ok, 1 at a time"

Like and Shared! #redbullmoments
🍑🍑 Happy New Year Red Bull Singapore ! 🍑🍑

It's always the relationship-related questions! So here's one with Hulk 😍💪🏼

Relatives: Girl ah, 几时找男朋友？(When are you gonna find a boyfriend)
Me: 不用找啦，应该是男的来找我😅😅  (Don't need to find lah, the guy should find me.....)

#redbullmoments

Relative: "Why you like put on weight? 肥了 (Fat already)" 

Me: "But... 肥是福。(Fat is prosperity.)" 😂😂😂

*Hence, posing with all the food. Food first before all else. 😋*

#REDBULLMOMENTS

Relatives: omg u look young this year leh!! How you do it Sia!! Teach me can? 

Me: very simple!! Just drink Red Bull and gain more energy!!

#redbullmoments

#redbullmoments 

Relatives: you with your bf very long le leh.. when are you getting married? 
Me: aiya, need time to slim down.. and giving you time to save up for a big ang bao before i send the red bomb mah :B you ready le mah? 
Relatives: ha ha ha .... (Awkward smile)

Relative: Eh why you lost weight? Never eat ah?

Me: no lah, because I started drinking Red Bull 25% Less Sugar, the healthier choice 😉👍 #redbullmoments

*Me sitting beside my mama*
Relative to mama: your daughter marry off already ah! Never come??
Mama: Eh... My girl sitting beside me leh!
Relative to me: *paiseh* HAHA Er... happy new year ah 😂
Me: ........... Sureee
#redbullmoments #redbullsingapore

#redbullmoments Red Bull Singapore

Relative: Wah!!!!! Long time no see! You so much look like your mother, if other people don't know they might take you for sisters. 

We just give her a big smile.  After awhile when she walk away......My girl whispered into my ears about how she did not like to wear the similar set of clothing as me. "I look so older than my age which gets me awaken responses and comments I hate most ."Exclaimed my upset daughter!!! ~_~ :(   #redbullmoments Red Bull Singapore

During CNY, my friends or kins are so "busybody", questioning me some awkward questions that are quite tough to reply 😂😂: #redbullmoments
1) what car do you drive? How do you take your parents out
Answer: I take public transport, because I failed my driving license 5 times, totally give up already. 
2) how much do you earn?still living with your parents? Not getting your own house?
*my reply : always not enough, but I am happy if you can give me extra, living with my parents is good because my mom will cook healthy soup and meals for me, do you jealous me? Haha...😊😊
3) Not young already, where is your girlfriend? * being single is all right, and it is a blessing you guys give me your ang paus, huat more if give out more and I am so blessed to receive them😊😊

So okay... I dont celebrate CNY, but I'm sure some of us married couples can relate to this question(which was pose to me Hari Raya last year)....

KPO human:
"Eh so long already u haven't gotten a child? Never try for IVF ah?.."

Me: IVF?!!.. Went already..!!

KPO human:
Oh really? Then how??.. Successful or not??..

Me: As the procedure was being carried out, the test tube broke..!!

KPO human: Alamak so poor thing..!! Never mind lah try again ok?!..

*slaps forehead* on every level😣

Liked and shared FTW!!..
Any ang baos will do for me.. not choosy!!.. And that Red Bull carton, much needed to ride like a Bull !!. 🤠🙏🏻

#redbullmoments @redbullsingapore

Relative: Aiyo! Why every year when u come for visiting u sure become fatter! 

Me: Thanks for the contribution to my size all these years! *while munching onto their delicious pineapple tart and sipping a can of Coke*

#redbullmoments Red Bull Singapore

Before I get married they will keep asking why I am still single and my reply will be
Because I still want to receive your ang bao
After I get married they keep asking when I will have a kid
My reply will be
Because after getting so many ang bao from you I decided to let you take a break for a few year :p

I now have a baby and they will now ask when I will have another one
My reply will be
I have only been getting one ang bao from you since young and I have a baby I dont think it's OK to receive two :p
Ha ha ha
#redbullmoments

Relatives: How come FaithFaith Ng (my 4 month girl) has a bald patch on top of her head?

Me: Didn't you notice? That's why she is MY daughter (pointing at the bald patch on my head). And in case you are wondering about JoyJoy Ng (my 2.5 year old Daughter), her big round tummy is what assures me I'm her Father! :P #redbullmoments

Liked and shared ! 
#redbullmoments 

All my relative: why you Quit jobs though your jobs very good ? 
Me: because my boss not good to me and treat me like a dog so I fire him be4 he do that ! 
All my relative: was like 💤 just say oh oh oh ! 
#redbull ! 
Hope to win this big ang bao to cover my things lol ! 😘 
Huat ah 🐓🍍 !
Redbull Give You Wings and Redbull let you Win All Year Round...Especially on this Golden Rooster Year 2017... Huat Ar with Redbull!

Aunty:Why aren’t you working?

Me: Because my forefathers fought so hard for freedom. It would be a shame not to utilise what they fought so hard for. ;)
#redbullmoments
Liked and Shared post!
Hope winning!

auntie: wen, what are your son doing now?
Me: currently serving N.S.
auntie: when ORD?
Me: soon, this year April.
auntie: wow, so fast. will he continue his studies after that or will looking for jobs?
Me: studies
auntie: will he be going to university?
Me: not sure, i am very hungry as i had not eaten.
auntie: oh, come , come, faster grab something eat first
Me: =.=
liked and shared!

Relatives: When can we expect wedding invitations from you two?
Answers: We’re still saving the money that why we are here visiting you for the ang bao!!

I never celebrate CNY but i am sure in any occation this will happen.
fOr me i hav 4 kids the eldest is 21 this year all this year ppl my relatives always ask 
Wah...ur son so big huh..easy lah u can shake leh..
i was huh..
if i shake leg who want to pay my bills..
guess what they say..
you hav 4 kids they can help what..duh.. #redbullmoments

Relative: How much are you earning now?

I would normally smile back and reply "I earn enough to keep myself happy". 😊

#redbullmoments

Liked & Shared.. 
Last time during CNY : aunties will ask me *got Galfriend or not*
This year Question upgraded *when u getting married*
😻

The awkward moment : 
Uncle ：lulu, 你胖了！
Me：我没有
Uncle: 你真得胖了
Me :(screaming into the kitchen for my friend )玲，我不吃新年午饭了， your dad say I fat ! 😭
#redbullmoments
#thatswhyichooselesssugar

Relative and friend: When are you getting married?
My answer(s):
Option A: I don't know. You have to ask him. *looks at boyfriend
Option B: I am waiting for my ring *looks at boyfriend again

If you can't beat the attention, divert it.

Boyfriend is rolling his eyes now...

Liked n shared.
Standard question: are you still studying 
Me: oh ya, I have been studying since 30 years ago.

Auntie: When you going to settle down.  I see you changing girlfriend every year. 
My reply: Not that I want to change girlfriend. Like mobile phone,  each version is getting better. Auntie, if I don't change now,  the warranty is lifetime. Even if the mobile phone can be repaired,  it's still an old phone.  Red Bull

20.post_text:
Chinese New Year is coming and we have 5 red hot ‘Ang Baos’ to give away to 5 lucky winners! Stand to win Ang Baos containing $88, $188, $288, $388 and the grand prize of $888 along with a carton of Red Bull 25% less sugar!

Simply follow the instructions below: 
1. Take a photo of you and your loved one(s) with a can of Red Bull 25% less sugar
2. Share with us the weirdest/funniest/awkward questions or moments that happens during Chinese New Year gatherings
3. Post it on our wall or tag us in your post and include the hashtag #redbullmoments

Remember to tag us @redbullsingapore in your posts and make your posts public or we won't be able to view them!

We’re sure you have tonnes of hilarious tales to share and we’re looking forward to receiving your entries! This will run till 6th February 2017. Remember, Red Bull will give you energy to go through these moments! ;)

Gong Xi Fa Cai!

comments.message:
#redbullmoments
#redbullsingapore

Granny: Ah min, you thirsty anot? Go fridge take some cold packet drink.
Me: Okay.
Me: Ah ma, where got packet drink?
Granny: Got ar. Is at the bottom of the fridge.
Me: Ah ma, don't have leh. Only got beer.
Granny: That what I mean packet drink.
Me: !!! Faint. You want bluff me help u finish your beer right.
Granny: Hahahahaha.

One of the most awkward questions I have ever encountered was when a relative asked if I would be interested in a gym membership to shake my post-baby weight. Though inwardly I was raging and burning emotional calories, I kept it cool and said: "Thank you but no thank you. My baby has kept me busy and this 10kg active bundle whom I babywear, jog after buses with and walked around a mall with is my personal and me-only access gym. And it's free 24/7! My body has nurtured and delivered a healthy bundle of joy and I think I deserve some slack and pineapple tarts this CNY." I think Baby agrees too that this mummy mattress is more comfortable than any baby cot! #redbullmoments @redbullsingapore

The weirdest and funniest moment happened during one Chinese New Year gathering was when I carry my cousin's baby to sit on my knees for a couple of minutes. The baby head tilt sideway and fall asleep. What come next was my other relatives giving me their babies to rock them to sleep. 
They asked: "Wow you so good in making babies fall asleep. You should have no problem taking care of your own." 
Me: "I have no idea what happen. I am watching TV and my knees rock and vibrate with the beats. May be the baby also like it and relax till fall asleep."
I talked to myself, actually the baby may be helplessly rock and vibrate by me till knockout. I mean fall asleep. Oops! 

Liked and shared.  #redbullcnymoments 

Drink Red Bull. 
恭喜发财
大吉大利

Distant aunt: Joey, looooong time no see. How were your exams? Did you manage to get into a good university?

Me: Errrr, I've already graduated.

Distant Aunt: Oh! So, when are you getting married?

Me: Wow, that escalated quick. 

I've apparently managed to jump from a yet-to-enrol-in-university adolescent to a ready-to-raise-a-child phase in the span of two questions. At least I look young on first impression! 
#redbullmoments #redbullsingapore

Here's the weirdest of the weirdest every year! 🤗

Aunt 1: Why can’t you be like your brother or sister?
Me: Because I’m a Unicorn 🦄! I’m unique! If I’m like them, who else are you going to torment?

Aunt 2: When are you getting married?
Me: But once I get married, I won’t receive hongbao from you anymore 😂
#redbullmoments

Me: If got confirm guarantee Any remedy for me to get daughter then I will try. You got good suggestion for me?  #redbullmoments probably I can try Red Bull 25% Less sugar with better health probably can help me out in this dilemma

We have 2 kids, a boy nd a girl, and After some time they started asking that when are w planning for the 3rd one as here its very normal to have 3 or more kids, and now that my lille girl has started schooling, than i must b having loads of time, so i should get the 3rd one real easy... oh god.. i mean really, if i have spare time than i should have baby... 😂😂😂 totally hillarious logic right.. that time i really needed the help of Red Bull 25% less sugar and keep my mind kool and smile on my face !!! 👍😊😊😊😊 #redbullmoments Red Bull Singapore

Apart from sugar, Red Bull 25% less sugar also contains B vitamins that play an important role in enhancing mental performance and physical endurance. 

Whether it's regulating your stress levels or providing that much needed energy boost, Red Bull 25% less sugar will be there for you in your daily activities! #redbullgotyourback

22.post_text:
As the saying goes “New Year’s resolutions are a bit like babies: They are fun to make but extremely difficult to maintain.” We are already two weeks into the New Year. Are you finding maintaining your resolutions a challenge? 

Introducing the Red Bull 25% less sugar, where you can do more with less! Whether it’s being more productive at work, learning a new language, or hitting the gym, Red Bull 25% less sugar will provide you with the boost that you need to stick to your resolutions!

#RedBullFacts 

A can of Red Bull contains 50 mg of caffeine – approximately equivalent to a cup of filtered coffee. 

Next time you’re looking for some much needed perk-me-up in the morning, why not have a can of Red Bull instead?
